TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompiledTemplateBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.ITemplate

Docs.summary: An implementation that is called from the generated page class code. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledTemplateBuilder> class is used by ASP.NET to create a template for a templated control from the generated class code. It is not meant to be used directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.BuildTemplateMethod buildTemplateMethod) cil managed

Docs.param: A delegate used to handle the method call.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is used internally by ASP.NET to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledTemplateBuilder> class. It is not meant to be used directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstantiateIn(class System.Web.UI.Control container) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the container used to store the child controls in the template.
Docs.summary: Populates the object with the child controls contained in the template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn%2A> method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate.InstantiateIn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method. It is used by ASP.NET to create the control hierarchy of the template and is not meant to be used directly in your code.
